author: mmarionncern
body:
The AK5 jets has been switched to ak4 jets inthe MET uncertainty tool called in the miniAOD configuration for consistency with the other jets in the CMSSW_7_0_X release

Two files modified with the following change :
-miniAOD configuration changed
-recoPFJet sequence with now the build of ak4Jets
title: Move from ak5 to ak4 jets in the metUncertainty tool
